title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.41 - Yield intersections
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.41 - Yield intersections

State Regulations
(a) Cross

County Parkway. (1)

All vehicles approaching
the Cross County Parkway from the following shall, before entering the same, yield the right-of-way to all approaching vehicles: Central Park Avenue
(2)

All vehicles approaching the following
from the Cross County Parkway shall, before entering the same, yield the
right-of-way to all approaching vehicles: Parkway South

LaBelle Road near New Rochelle Road
(b) Hutchinson River Parkway. (1)

All vehicles approaching the Hutchinson

River Parkway from the following shall, before entering the same, yield the
right-of-way to all approaching vehicles: Wolf's Lane

Westchester Avenue
(2)

All vehicles approaching the following
from the Hutchinson River Parkway shall, before entering the same, yield the
right-of-way to all approaching vehicles: Westchester Avenue
(c) Saw Mill River Parkway. (1)

All vehicles approaching the Saw Mill

River Parkway from the following shall, before entering the same, yield the
right-of-way to all approaching vehicles: McLean Avenue gas stations

Cross County Parkway

Rumsey Road

Yonkers Avenue--westbound

Gavin Street near Palmer Avenue

Ball Avenue

Rossiter Avenue from Tuckahoe Road

Odell Avenue

Odell Maintenance Headquarters

Farragut Parkway gas stations

Farragut Parkway--southbound entrance only

Ashford Avenue

Route 119 (White Plains--Tarrytown Road)--northeast, southeast and southwest quadrants only

Old Saw Mill River Road (Tarrytown Road)

Route 9A (Exit 25)

Roaring Brook Road--northbound from westbound only

Route 133 (West Main Street)--southeast and southwest
quadrants only

Croton Avenue

Kisco Avenue

Cherry Street and Bedford Road

Bedford Road and Harris Road--southeast and southwest
quadrants only
(2)

All
vehicles approaching the following from the Saw Mill River Parkway shall, before entering the same, yield the right-of-way to all approaching vehicles: Roaring Brook Road--eastbound from northbound only
(d) Sprain Brook State

Parkway. All vehicles approaching the following from the Sprain Brook State

Parkway shall, before entering the same, yield the right-of- way to all
approaching vehicles: Tuckahoe Road--northeast and southwest quadrants
(e) Taconic State Parkway. All
vehicles approaching the Taconic State Park way from the following shall, before entering the same, yield the right-of-way to all approaching vehicles: Mohansic State Parkway, entering parkway to travel
north

Bear Mountain State Parkway

Miller Hill Road overlook

Route 82, Dutchess County, northeast and northwest
quadrants only

Route 55

Route 44

Salt Point Turnpike

Pumpkin Lane Overlook

Route 109

Jackson Corners Road

Gallatin Overlook

Lake Taghkanic State Park

Overlook located approximately 4/10 mile north of Route
217

Town Road located approximately 1/2 mile south of Thruway
toll plaza

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
182.41

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
